results.content: Really feel like I got my money's worth with this course and learned a lot.  The idea of creating templates from scratch concepts in Photoshop has always been intimidating to me but the instructor really did a wonderful job of breaking into steps that made sense.  Explained everything well and I learned a little more PHP along the way...  The only negative comments I would have were with video corruption problems I experienced in two of the lectures; I'm hoping those will be fixed.  Really happy with this course and can't wait to try out what I have learned.
results.content_html: Really feel like I got my money's worth with this course and learned a lot. The idea of creating templates from scratch concepts in Photoshop has always been intimidating to me but the instructor really did a wonderful job of breaking into steps that made sense. The only negative comments I would have were with video corruption problems I experienced in two of the lectures; I'm hoping those will be fixed. results.content: Template design seemed like a mysterious black art before I went through this course.  Now it all makes sense.  Although there is  a lot to cover and sometimes the author speeds right through new conscepts and code details.  But, the beauty is that I could always rewind and replay.   Only thing lacking is nothing about responsive design - think that is going to be covered in a new Joomla 3 course according to an answer by the teacher.   Thanks, taught me a lot.  Now just to try it out.

Although there is a lot to cover and sometimes the author speeds right through new conscepts and code details. But, the beauty is that I could always rewind and replay. Only thing lacking is nothing about responsive design - think that is going to be covered in a new Joomla 3 course according to an answer by the teacher. Thanks, taught me a lot. Now just to try it out.
